00001 /*
00002  * File: LinearSolverBase.h
00003  * ------------------------
00004  * Base class for all linear solvers.
00005  *
00006  * ------------------------------------------ 
00007  * Created      02/30/01        Hcao 
00008  *
00009  */
00010 #ifndef LINEARSOLVERBASE_H_
00011 #define LINEARSOLVERBASE_H_
00012 #include "../facilities/Facilities.h" 
00013 #include "../utl/DataPool.h"
00014 #include "PreconditionerBase.h"
00015 
00016 class PreconditionerBase;
00017 class Facilities;
00018 
00019 class LinearSolverBase {
00020 public:
00021         LinearSolverBase(int nCells_, int nConns_, int nComps_, const Facilities* pFac);
00022         virtual ~LinearSolverBase();
00023 
00024         virtual void registerData(DataPool *dataPool);                  // register data from data pool
00025         virtual bool solve(bool cR)=0;                                                  // solve AX=B
00026         // $PS$: write jacobian to files for adjoint
00027         virtual void writeJacobian(int ts, double dt, double dtbc, double dtbn, bool islast);
00028 
00029 protected:
00030         int nCells, nConns, nComps, nWells; 
00031 
00032         int nR, nW, nA;                                                         // number of reservoir rows and well rows in A, nA = nR+nW
00033         int nA_max;
00034 
00035         const int *nImpVars;                                            // number of implicit variables for each cell
00036         const int *mRHSIndex;                                                           // starting location in RHS for each cell (needed for AIM)
00037         int *mwRHSIndex;                                                        // starting location in RHS for each well 
00038         const double *mDiag, *mOffD_A, *mOffD_B;        // reservoir Jacobian 
00039         const double *mDiagAcc;                                         // $PS$: for old Jacobian
00040         double *mRHS;                                                           // RHS
00041         double **mRWJ, **mWRJ, **mWWJ, **mWWRHS;        // well Jacobian and RHS
00042 
00043         const Facilities *pFacilities;                          // pointer to wells
00044         int *nWPerfs, **mWLoc;                                          // pointer to number of well perforation and well location
00045 
00046         double *A, *B;                                                          // matrix A and RHS B
00047 
00048         double tol;                                                                     // covergence tolerance (normalized residual)
00049         int maxIter;                                                            // max number of iteration
00050 
00051         int preChoice;                                                          // preconditioner choice
00052         PreconditionerBase *mPre;                                       // pointer to the preconditioner
00053         int mThermal;
00054         DataPool *mDataPool;                                            // $PS$ for POD
00055 
00056         // --- methods used in solve() -----
00057         virtual void prepare(bool cR) {};                       // preparation before solve
00058         virtual void setupA() = 0;                                      // setup matrix A       
00059         virtual void setupRHS();                                        // setup RHS B from mRHS
00060         virtual void updateRHS(const double *x);        // put the solution back to mRHS from x 
00061 
00062         // --- methods used in prepare() ---
00063         virtual void calcRHSIndex();                            // calculate mRHSIndex
00064         virtual void calcNW();                                          // calculate nW 
00065 
00066 private:
00067         void createData();                                                      // create data
00068 
00069 };
00070 
00071 #endif
